articles.title: Trade union of public service workers formed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Trade union of public service workers formed in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- The preparatory committee for the trade union of public service workers held an inaugural ceremony of the trade union in Seoul on March 16, Seoul-based Radio No. 1 reported.
 The organization elected Ri Jong Chon who is chairman of the north Jolla provincial council of workshops of public service workers the first chairman of the trade union and vowed to strive for the reform in the overall social life including politics.

articles.content:
Credentials to Kim Yong Nam
     Pyongyang, March 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, received credentials from Tomas Smetanka, new Czech ambassador  to the DPRK, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Present was Choe Su Hon, vice-minister of foreign affairs.    
 After receiving credentials, Kim Yong Nam conversed with the ambassador.
